start.description: Whether to start the countdown or not, the default is true, and you can set this value to control the timing of the countdown
start.description_zh: 是否开始倒计时，默认为 true，可以通过设置该值控制倒计时的时机

title.description: The title of the numeric value

:now.description: Used to correct the incorrect display of initialization time
:now.description_zh: 用于修正初始化时间显示不正确

:styleValue.description: The style of the numeric value

:renderFormat.description: Customize the render function. valueDiff represents the time difference between the two times, and formattedDiff represents the time difference after formatting,
:renderFormat.description_zh: 自定义 render 函数。valueDiff 表示两个时间的时间差，formattedDiff 表示格式化后的时间差，

events.name: onFinish
events.description: A callback that is triggered after the countdown is complete
events.description_zh: 倒计时完成后触发的回调
